title: "Accomodations"

### Conference Costs

Attendance at the conference sessions is **free of charge**. Coffee and light refreshments will be provided during breaks throughout the conference days.

Attendees are responsible for booking and paying for their own accommodation and meals. Trondheim offers a wide variety of lodging and dining options to suit different preferences and budgets.

### Accommodation Suggestions

Here are a few options ranging from luxury to budget-friendly. Many hotels are located in the city center, offering convenient access to the venue via public transport or walking.

**Luxury:**

* **[Britannia Hotel](https://britannia.no/en){target="_blank"}:**
    A historic, 5-star hotel in the city center known for its elegance, spa, and
    Michelin-starred restaurant, Speilsalen.

**Mid-Range:**

* **[Radisson Blu Royal Garden Hotel](https://www.radissonhotels.com/en-us/hotels/radisson-blu-trondheim-royal-garden){target="_blank"}:**
    Located centrally, often popular for events.
* **[Scandic Nidelven](https://www.scandichotels.com/hotels/norway/trondheim/scandic-nidelven){target="_blank"}:**
    Contemporary hotel by the river, known for its award-winning breakfast.
    Close to the Solsiden area.
* **[Thon Hotel Nidaros](https://www.thonhotels.com/our-hotels/norway/trondheim/thon-hotel-nidaros/){target="_blank"}:**
    Stylish hotel in a historic building near the train station.
* **[Scandic Bakklandet](https://www.scandichotels.com/hotels/norway/trondheim/scandic-bakklandet){target="_blank"}:**
    Situated in the charming Bakklandet district.
* **[Thon Hotel Trondheim](https://www.thonhotels.com/our-hotels/norway/trondheim/thon-hotel-trondheim/){target="_blank"}:**
    Centrally located option.
* **[Scandic Solsiden](https://www.scandichotels.com/hotels/norway/trondheim/scandic-solsiden){target="_blank"}:**
    Located in the popular Solsiden district with many restaurants and shops
    nearby.
* **[Scandic Lerkendal](https://www.scandichotels.com/hotels/norway/trondheim/scandic-lerkendal){target="_blank"}:**
    Large, modern hotel connected to Lerkendal stadium, a bit further from the
    absolute center but well-connected.

**Budget-Friendly:**

*   **[RUMi Hostel](https://www.rumi.no/){target="_blank"}:**
    A hostel option for budget travelers.

For a more comprehensive list including B&Bs and other options, please check
[Visit Trondheim's Accommodation page](https://visittrondheim.no/en/accommodation/){target="_blank"}.

### Dining Suggestions

Trondheim is celebrated as a European Region of Gastronomy and "Home of Nordic Flavours". You'll find a diverse range of dining options:

*   **Fine Dining:** Including Michelin-starred restaurants like Speilsalen (Britannia Hotel) and Credo.
*   **Casual Eateries:** Numerous cafes, bistros, and restaurants offering Norwegian and international cuisine. Check out areas like Bakklandet and Solsiden.
*   **Coffee & Bakeries:** Plenty of cozy spots for coffee and pastries.
*   **Special Diets:** Options for vegan, vegetarian, and other dietary needs are available.
*   **Bars & Pubs:** A lively nightlife scene with craft breweries, cocktail bars, and traditional pubs.

Explore options on the [Visit Trondheim Eat & Drink page](https://visittrondheim.no/en/eat-and-drink/). It's recommended to book tables for dinner, especially at popular restaurants.
